definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: beaten;—only in combin. [[שֶׁמֶן כָּתִית]] beaten oil, i.e. oil made by beating or pounding the olives in a mortar; esp. fine and costly (cf. Levy:NHWB ii. 443 sub [[כָּתִית]]);—1Ki 5:25, Ex 29:40, Nu 28:5; [[לַמָּאוֹר]] ´[[שֶׁמֶן זַית זׇךְ כ]] Ex 27:20 pure beaten olive oil for the lamp = Le 24:2 (Hex only H.P).
